GameItemType.Description: A beautiful necklace to put that poisonous sparkle in your shimmering eyes.
The next time someone dares to lay a hand (or a sword) on you, this reprobate necklace will allow you to channel your hatred and convert it into the deadliest of curses.

GameModifier.Provides: Enemies that strike the wearer have a 33% chance of being cursed with Graveseal

GameItemType.Description: Only Wraiths can wear this amulet directly against bare skin without being wracked with violent shivers of disgust. Irrational phobias aside, you'll be able to lord over the eight legged ones and augment the potency of your villainous venoms. It's important to remember those benefits when the next retching bout occurs.

GameModifier.Provides: Summon Arachnid- Summons a random level 6 Spider

GameItemType.Description: A belt of clinking links which gives a new meaning to the phrase "tiresome to be around with", turning the figurative rhetoric into a concrete physical application.

GameModifier.Provides: Belt of Weariness Effect- Units struck suffer -1 to Stamina and growth is halted for 3 turns

GameItemType.Description: This beautiful statuette allows its owner to distort the space and time continuum and cast haste on a global scale.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the wielder to cast Mass Haste

GameItemType.Description: These evil tapers appear to be leftovers from some twisted and depraved sacrificial ceremony. They're devised to give cultists a powerful rush when the victim's life is finally extinguished.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Hit Points to allies whenever an enemy is killed

GameItemType.Description: If you believe the faded letters inscribed on the dirty label, gulping down this bluish solution can turn an old warhorse into a young stallion. Does that mean you won't be able to proudly exhibit your scars around the campfire tonight?

GameModifier.Provides: A repairing remedy of the highest order

GameItemType.Description: Believed to be a shard chipped directly from Vetrar's heart, this crystal can unleash the fury of winter.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the wielder to cast Freezing Ray

GameItemType.Description: Once in a blue moon the wine will indeed turn blue. And after a night of revelry, the nation shall not awake with the expected headache. It shall instead greet the day with invigorated confidence and renewed hope.
A treatise on breaking down the concept of magic. Ponderous but rewarding reading as it teaches how to focus on resisting adverse spell effects.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Spell Resistance ability

GameItemType.Description: Breaking a mirror doesn't necessarily punish the clumsy culprit. The shattered glass in this banged up frame will distort the reflection of your adversaries and reveal the weaknesses in their armor.
Your range and scope really expand whenever you keep these two good luck charms on your person. Now let's go score some bull's eyes.
By its very nature, this is obviously a temporary agreement. You did read the fine print before it blackened, right?
These steely protuberances will deflect many blows and drive away the most persistent suitors.
This self-replenishing cauldron of stew will fatten up your citizens and provoke a minor population boom.

Bringing Choker Spores to the battlefield clearly violates the rules of a fair fight. What rules again? Right. Anyway, be sure to be upwind if you intend to pelt your opponents with one of these lethal gas bags.

GameModifier.Provides: Select a target area and choke your opponents for 3 Poison damage per round.

GameItemType.Description: Any liquid poured into this chalice will turn instantly into the deadliest poison. A delightful drinking accessory to bring to either plebeian feasts or highbrow soirees.
While the flavor is an acquired taste, this potion has undeniable virtues, namely granting a sharper eye and a better aim. So drink up already!

Could this possibly be the headpiece of one of the mythical Plane Travelers? Luck of the Saints, why it is! Because the general theory of dimensional shifting requires a very specific and very convoluted mindset, you will have to satisfy yourself with activating only its most basic powers. Don't you pout now, blinking around in a semi tangible state ain't exactly chopped liver.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to cast Dimensional Translocation

GameItemType.Description: This finely crafted whip should motivate the laggards in your army to put some speed into it.
What did your parents say about having a pet spider in the house?
Remember what they say about feeding a snake.

The title of this book is fairly self-explanatory. It contains all the classics ranging from "the Glitter Emperor with the Gildar Touch" to "Pariden's Shadow Warrior". There are also a few rather obscure stories which will undoubtedly regal your troops around campfires. A window to better times.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Loremaster ability

GameItemType.Description: A piece of primeval ice broken off the wintry hair of the world's rooftop, this icicle's core is self regenerative and will stubbornly refuse to melt even in a blacksmith's raging furnace.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the wielder to cast Ice Ring

GameItemType.Description: Created for highborn virgins in order to thwart amorous advances, this colorful belt will also work to prevent that speeding mace from landing square in your face.
There is no need to tell anyone you believe in lucky charms, you know deep down this clover will bring you good fortune.
Inhaling this delicate perfume will allow you to relive past events in a new light and distinguish hidden meanings and elusive details. Wisdom in a bottle.

The transition from fall into winter is usually gradual and goes unnoticed. And sometimes it can be so sudden and violent as to become a devastating glacial onslaught which turns the world into a frozen wasteland in the blink of an eye. In these rare moments, autumn's symbols can freeze to the core and be encased in permanent ice, their fragile shells turning into improbable recipients for tremendous wintry powers.
A belt made for Giants and yet it fits your waist perfectly? There must be magical forces at work here so don't start the diet just yet.

GameModifier.Provides: Power Sweep- Attack all enemies within a 1 tile radius, push them back and knock them prone

GameItemType.Description: When it flows straight from the heart, it's vital, it's pure and it's supremely strong.
Until you find the rightful owner of this lost shoe, you'll be able to make an in-depth analysis as to whether Lady Luck truly puts her mark on equine footwear.

The following instructions can be deciphered on this icy bottle: "Concentrated freezing particles of the explosive kind magically sealed in a bottle. Requires selecting a hapless target before using."

GameModifier.Provides: Select your target and blast away for 18 Cold damage.

GameItemType.Description: Whosoever shall write down their deepest thoughts onto these indefatigable pages will be rewarded with the gift of immeasurable erudition.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Erudite Ability - +30 Experience and +10% Research

GameItemType.Description: Cut from the purest jade, this magical ring isn't just a pricey bit of jewelry. It can also serve as either a toxin receptacle or an antidote. Or both.

GameModifier.Provides: Melee attacks also do 2 Poison damage per round to the victim

GameItemType.Description: Curse your opponents by spearing this doll with a few choice nails and needles and witness for yourself the horrific effects of your handiwork.

GameModifier.Provides: Inflicts a random horrific curse upon an enemy unit

GameItemType.Description: The contents of this letter describe in great lifelike details the success of an intricate heroic quest. It's so captivating you feel as if you could have been a participant. And the strangest thing is that all of protagonists' names have been mysteriously erased. You only need to fill in the blanks and claim for yourself the glory of these anonymous champions.
Being generous is easy when you have a lot to give back. Maybe this maxim is preposterous when applied to a lightning struck branch but don't knock down heartfelt attempts to elevate the debate.
The blue solution caught inside this vial is rippling with energy and actively sloshing against its glassy prison. It's almost as if it would break out and found its own liquid kingdom.

Ah the legendary Lost Barrowhill Wine! Its vines are said to grow on the burial grounds of the Arcane War casualties, charged with the wild magic of a thousand sleeping Archmages. You could get a lot more than a hangover from ingesting this heady liquor. Plus there's always a gold coin to be found at the bottom of the jug.

GameModifier.Provides: Lost Barrowhill Wine Effect- Random effect on the Caster

GameItemType.Description: This alchemical marvel is notoriously difficult to brew, requiring costly out-of-this-world ingredients, state of the art equipment and the expert skills to match. Ingesting it will develop that latent physical and mental potential and push it to the surface. Drink without moderation and amplify it all.

The Etheral Mushroom, commonly referred to as the "Manashroom", is a succulent delicacy gorged with magical vitamins. The preferred method of consumption is usually raw for cooking it will exude a stench strangely reminiscent of an Undead outhouse.
This anvil has been idle for far too long and awaits those beatings hammers with feverish metallic anticipation.

GameModifier.Provides: Collect all three Tools of the Mastersmith to cast Forging Excellence- Army gains +6 Attack, +6 Critical Chance and +100% Critical Damage

GameItemType.Description: Someone left their mortar and pestle in a hurry and evidently in the middle of a complex alchemical recipe. Perhaps you could attempt to finish the work? It's a very delicate formula so don't bungle it up!
This timeworn spellbook crackles with arcane knowledge and its pages rustle with the mysteries hiding within. Yes, there is so much the ancient masters can still teach us.

GameModifier.Provides: Elemental Myriad- Grants your army random Elemental damage for the duration of the battle

GameItemType.Description: It's quite known that eating one of these mushrooms is akin to a toss of the proverbial dice. Dare you eat it?
It's quite known that eating one of these mushrooms is akin to a toss of the proverbial dice. Dare you eat it?

This strange contraption is made of a hard yet pliable material and it's hard to say whether it's organic or mineral based. Gorging on the energy released when a soul is severed from its physical host, the corolla jerks and pulses while emitting nauseating sucking and slurping noises. Not compatible with any form of elegance.

GameModifier.Provides: +3 Hit Points whenever an enemy is killed
+3 Mana Points whenever an enemy is killed
+3 Stamina whenever an enemy is killed

GameItemType.Description: Even the most musically challenged individual can play divine songs with this legendary lyre. Its unearthly melodies can cure fatal despair and lift the spirits of an entire nation.
If an oyster spat this pearl out, it must have been one heck of an archmage amongst its kind.
The Ovum Philosophorum! Yes the legendary alchemical achievement of the highest order! Your status has just shifted from a miserable debtor to a universal creditor.
A nice little two-timing pocket dagger for duplicitous arterial carving. Deceit becomes you.
Drink this stormy brew and let lightning bolts become the instruments of your raging anger.

GameModifier.Provides: +4 Lightning Attack for the duration of combat

GameItemType.Description: This colorful belt may look like an innocuous and fancy clothing accessory but case in point, that only proves how much appearances can be deceiving. Each link has been empowered with either Cold, Fire, Lightning or Poison and elemental devastation will be released every time you strike an enemy.

GameModifier.Provides: Prismatic Belt Effect- + 4-8 Elemental Attack per hit

GameItemType.Description: When all hope is lost and tragic endings await, sounding this horn will strengthen the heart of your allies and push them to accomplish the impossible.
Cruor of old Troll, dipped in the fountain of youth. A brew with no toll, to cure that aching loose tooth.

GameModifier.Provides: Rejuvenating Fusion Effect- Healing an injury comes with the added benefit of a random permanent increase in Hit Points

GameItemType.Description: Physical contact makes you immediately realize that this is no ordinary ring. Images of burning cities and charring corpses enter your mind and fill you with a longing to put everything to the torch.
A severe cold front has been announced and just this once, it won't be coming from the skies.
Slipping this luxurious ring on your finger will release the toxic magic swirling within the stone and enchant your army's weapons with poison, turning it into a de facto pack of snakes.
Never eat finger lickin' good pastries while wearing this intoxicating ring.
If this ring isn't worn on a finger, take a wild guess where you put it? For equipped males only.

The exquisiteness of this piece of jewelry belies the tremendous power contained within. It will transform your army into a booming charge of thunderous mayhem, delivering electrical damage on a massive scale.
A comprehensive guide presenting more than a thousand facts about the scurrying little ones and how to protect your crops from their insatiable hunger.
This bouncy stone magically asserts that every attack should be followed by a retaliative strike. An "in your face" accessory, so to speak.
The contents of this hefty gunny sack should keep your army's stomachs from grumbling for a quite a while. No fine cuisine but at the end of the weary day, who really cares? Now who gets to carry it?
Life Magic has been instilled into this powerful charm, protecting its lucky owner from outward profanations and harmful transgressions.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit has a 40% chance of resisting a Critical attack

GameItemType.Description: Someone must have a hole in their pocket. Just jingle these few coins and see who comes a'calling.
For once that annoying scribbler in the background wrote down something useful.
Have you considered retreating to your own private tower for some well deserved downtime? Wait no further! Invoke your very own Arcane Monolith today!

GameModifier.Provides: Creates an Arcane Monolith on the map which extends your Zone of Control.

GameItemType.Description: Runes of Horror have been etched on this parchment and only await your order to strike soul crushing terror in the hearts of your foes.

GameModifier.Provides: All enemies are stunned for 3 actions unless they resist.

GameItemType.Description: The difference between being focused and obsessed is paper thin indeed.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Obsession spell

GameItemType.Description: The lines enclosed in this parchment speak to aggressive temperaments.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Lethal ability

GameItemType.Description: This ancient scroll teaches the reader where to hit to deadly effects.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Vital Strike ability

GameItemType.Description: These magical chains can break the spirit of Men and Fallen alike by forcing the yoke of enslavement upon their shoulders. Your will is your command.

GameModifier.Provides: Shackles of Enslavement- Enslaves a Trained Unit unless they resist. Caster must be adjacent to the target.

GameItemType.Description: Aiming the magic stored within this shell at enemy armies will curse them with slow motion.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the wielder to cast Mass Slow

GameItemType.Description: This nugget of pure solid Mana vibrates with inner forces just awaiting release. In the meantime, it will act as a magical sponge for dispatched souls and convert them into precious refined essence.

GameModifier.Provides: +3 Mana Points whenever an enemy is killed

GameItemType.Description: When the Undead armies of Mardoban had broken down the last remaining defenses of Castle Everlond and were about to massacre its inhabitants, young Lady Virgeanne, in her utter panic, unwittingly unleashed the powers of the Thunderclap Amulet she was wearing. The fury of the heavens suddenly rained down upon the Revenants, frying them on the spot. And to think no one had lent any credence to her farfetched claims that the necklace had been given to her by an elusive winged suitor...

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to cast Thunderstorm

GameItemType.Description: This very official looking parchment grants a noble title and the lands to go along with it. Castle, vassals and serfs not included.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Famous Ability - +1 Fame per Season

GameItemType.Description: This token will summon a furry packmate, the bane of shepherds.
This token will summon a formidable hunter.
The philosophies within will carry your mind to greater heights.

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Knowledge ability

GameItemType.Description: "I'd have to be non compos mentis to leave my Triad Amulet lying at home on the vanity dresser." - Jemalia Blackheart.
Spiteful vipers and malicious asps sing their poisonous melodies deep into our veins, deep into our hearts.
